src/lib/components/DashKetcher.react.js.description:
DashKetcher is a Component to use Ketcher drawer with Dash.
It outputs the current drawn structure as a SMILES string,
and can also draw the structure corresponding to a provided
SMILES string.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

editor_url.description: The URL of sketcher html webpage.

editor_id.description: The title of the Ketch iframe.

editor_height.description: The height of the module. Unit is required (eg: %, px)

editor_width.description: The width of the module. Unit is required (eg: %, px)

output_SMILES.description: The computed SMILES string by Ketcher - output only.

trigger_getSmiles.description:
When this prop changes, the component runs getSmiles
and updates output_SMILES.

input_SMILES.description: The SMILES string for which Ketcher should draw the structure.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
